DOC.brief_title: Serum Sclerostin Level & Treatment Vitamin D Deficiency
DOC.detailed_description: This study prospective , observational , single-center study . Ethical approval obtain Institutional Review Board . This study complete patient Vitamin D deficiency . An intravenous cannula insert antecubital vein . Blood sample obtain treatment . Serum collect centrifuge 15 minute 1000Xg within 30 minute collection . Aliquots serum add eppendorf tube store -20Â°C . Serum sclerostin level measure use Human Sclerostin ELISA kit ( Cusabio , Catalog No : CSB-E13146h , Newark , DE , USA ) . All assay perform accord manufacturer 's instruction . The minimum detectable concentration human sclerostin typically < 0.012 ng/ml . Intra-assay precision less 8 % .
DOC.criteria: Premenopausal Serum 25 ( OH ) D < 10 ng/mL Anemia Tumorinduced osteomalacia ( hypophosphatemia ) Hypothyroidism Hepatic / renal disease Primary hyperparathyroidism Fibromyalgia Polymyalgia rheumatica Serum 25 ( OH ) D > 10 ng/mL Vitamin D calcium treatment commence prior study participation
